definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Not much changes. Let's look at the other method using anti-derivatives.
sentences.chinese: 沒有多大變化，來看看用不定積分的方法怎麼做。

sentences.english: A new method is given which can solve the indefinite integral.
sentences.chinese: 本文給出求不定積分的一種新方法。

sentences.english: The indefinite integral is an antiderivative .
The indefinite integral is an antiderivative.
It is very difficult to solve the indefinite integral with general method.
sentences.chinese: 用常規方法求解不定積分問題是相當困難的。

sentences.english: The other thing you could try to say is, wait, I already know how to take anti-derivatives.
sentences.chinese: 另外你可能會說，我已經知道怎麼求不定積分了。

sentences.english: Now we have another method to look at which is using anti-derivatives.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們來看另一種方法，即求不定積分。
